about_the_game:
Embark on a retro sci-fi journey in "Clone Your Way Out," a charming puzzle side-scrolling game with a nostalgic pixel art style. Control a troupe of lovable pink clones on a daring escape from a mysterious lab facility. To navigate through the treacherous maze of challenges ahead, you'll need to master the art of cloning!

In each level you'll encounter deadly puzzles that require cunning and sacrifice to overcome. Utilize the powerful Clone Gun to replicate your team, creating duplicates that can activate switches, go through iron bars, and unlock new pathways. But be warned: success often demands sacrifice, and many of your clones will meet untimely (and gory) ends in pursuit of freedom.

With its retro-inspired visuals and unique cloning mechanic, "Clone Your Way Out" offers a nostalgic yet refreshing gaming experience. Immerse yourself in a world filled with intricate puzzles, devious traps, and adorable little pink clones as you clone your way trough challenges and plot your daring escape!

Features:
• Retro pixel art style: Enjoy a visually charming experience reminiscent of classic arcade games.
• CRT goodness: Toggle the CRT filter in the game menu to push the retro experience even further!
• Unique clone-based gameplay: Use the Clone Gun to replicate yourself and solve mind-bending puzzles!
• Deadly obstacles: Navigate through a variety of traps and hazards that stand between you and the exit.

Are you ready to guide your clones to freedom? Prepare for a puzzle-packed adventure filled with danger, sacrifice, and plenty of retro charm in "Clone Your Way Out"!

content_descriptors.notes: The characters die and there are blood on their death.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.0
  • Processor: Ambos
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.0
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Clone Your Way Out

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics for 12th Gen
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a retro sci-fi journey in "Clone Your Way Out," a puzzle side-scroller with nostalgic pixel art. You'll control clones escaping from a mysterious lab, using a Clone Gun to solve deadly puzzles and traps. Enjoy retro visuals and unique cloning mechanics as you guide your clones to freedom.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
